Insurance

Section: Item Display

INSURANCE.

DANIEL P. TYLER, Agent for the AETNA INSURANCE OFFICE, will insure all
Insurable property on reasonable terms.

            Brooklyn 29
th July, 1833. 

Section: Featured Content

Above: 1819 Ætna Symbol

Commentary

The Ætna was doing well in this era, paying high dividends and building a strong name for itself, especially in fire insurance. Henry Ross Gall and William George Jordan, One Hundred Years of Fire Insurance: Being a History of the Ætna Insurance Company, Hartford, Connecticut, 1819-1919 (Hartford: Ætna Insurance Company, 1919), p. 77.

Transcription

INSURANCE.

DANIEL P. TYLER, Agent for the AETNA INSURANCE OFFICE, will insure all
Insurable property on reasonable terms.

            Brooklyn 29
th July, 1833. 

Commentary
The Ætna was doing well in this era, paying high dividends and building a strong name for itself, especially in fire insurance. Henry Ross Gall and William George Jordan, One Hundred Years of Fire Insurance: Being a History of the Ætna Insurance Company, Hartford, Connecticut, 1819-1919 (Hartford: Ætna Insurance Company, 1919), p. 77.
